participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Passionate and creative, Emily is always looking for ways to express herself through music.
participant_1.background: I am a country music singer. I started playing guitar when I was three. We spent summers camping at national parks. My favorite band is Rascal Flatts.

participant_2.name: Mike Johnson
participant_2.personality: Pragmatic and resilient, Mike draws strength from his experiences as a single dad and a musician.
participant_2.background: I live in California, but the recording artist market was dead last year. I am a recording engineer and own my own studio. I prefer being inside. What's up? I am a 46-year-old single dad with two kids. My ex cheated and left me for a lawyer.

content.text: Hey! Are you a country music singer? Because I am.
I like to sing in the band.
very nice i would like to record them
I like to play music when I get a chance to play in the band
Thank you. What do you do?üòÄ
i am a recording engineer and own my own studio.
I like to play music when I play music
